$select =""; $idmara=""; $select = array("*" => "*"); $tables = array("marca" => ""); $where = array( "id" => "=" . $produc[10], "nombre" => "='" . $produc[11] . "'" ); $marca = ControllerQueryes::SELECT($select, $tables, $where); if (count($marca)==0) { $insert = ""; $insert = array( "table"=>"marca", "nombre"=> $produc[11], "LASTID" => "TRUE", ); $idmarca = ControllerQueryes::INSERT($insert); $idmara= ["id_marca"=> $idmarca]; }else{ $idmara=["id_marca"=> $produc[10]]; } //$insert= $insert + $idmara;
